title: WATCH LIVE | Will he resign? Joburg Mayor Herman Mashaba briefs media on his plans
text:
WATCH LIVE | Will he resign? Joburg Mayor Herman Mashaba briefs media on his plans

21 October, 10:05 AM

Johannesburg Mayor Herman Mashaba is expected to tell the nation on Monday whether he is staying put or resigning as the city's number one resident.

His call for a press conference came after former Democratic Alliance (DA) leader Helen Zille was elected as the party's new federal council chairperson.

News24 understands Mashaba met with some DA leaders on Saturday, where he said he would resign if Zille emerged victorious.

Two provincial leaders and one national leader told News24 that Mashaba was going to announce his resignation as mayor.

READ MORE | Mashaba calls press conference: Mayor to resign, sources say
description: Johannesburg Mayor Herman Mashaba is expected to tell the nation whether he is staying put or resigning as the city's number one resident. Watch live.
